title: gurujangid
author: gurujangid
content: How can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: gurujangid on April 02, 2023, 08:41:37 AMHow can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?There is no amount to what you can start at crypto market. Even $5 can, but considering how the fees on exchanges and dex, you should save first in order to maximize the profit if you meant ia for trading. But I suggest you increase your budget like save some and only do when you got enough. Also do some studying first before engaging into trading cause this isnt something we take so lightly.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: Start what actually? Do you mean how can you start investing on Bitcoin or other crypto currency with 10$ Its all depends on your jurisdiction if it's country which is crypto friendly then you can likely fine someone who can sell BTC to you via P2P which you can receive using your preferred crypto wallet irrespective of which currency you want.

comments.author: Maus0728
comments.body: You are probably going to lose it especially if you do not have any idea how cryptocurrency market works.But looking at the positive light, holding $10 in bitcoin could give you a real-life experience of buying and conducting bitcoin transaction, which you can keep in non-custodial wallets, which I highly recommend you to do especially for educational purposes.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.created_time: April 02, 2023, 08:57:41 AMLast edit: April 02, 2023, 09:11:43 AM by Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: If you are buying crypto via P2P, it's possible to start with $10 or less, but if you are buying on the exchange, please note that there are some exchanges that allow a minimum buy, such as Binance, and you cannot buy on the sports trade with $10 because there will be fees attached that will require you to have at least $11 so that after the fee has been deducted, you will still have about $10 to invest. $10 may be small, but you wouldn't want a situation where your little effort becomes wasted, so after you buy your coin on the CEX, do not leave it on that platform; kindly move it to a non-custodial wallet. The $10 you are putting into the crypto market will not yield you much ROI in a short time, unless you are holding for a long time or gradually adding to your investment to accumulate more.There are a lot of members here with trading ideas, so I asked that you move the topic to the trading discussion board, To move to trading discussion, check at the bottom left corner of this thread and you will see move topic. Tap on it and from the next menu, select Economic-trading discussion. good luck

comments.author: MIner1448
comments.body: It can be quite difficult to start trading in the cryptocurrency market with $10, as many exchanges have limits on the minimum transaction size and require a larger deposit.Try to buy a small amount of cryptocurrency on an exchange that allows you to start with a small deposit. Some of these exchanges are Binance, Coinbase, Kraken. But you need to be careful, as many of these exchanges charge high fees, which can quickly eat into your funds.Try trading on an exchange that offers leverage such as BitMEX, Bitfinex, Binance. This means that you can borrow more money than you have in your account, which can increase your profits but also increase your risk of losing funds.Consider investing in crypto funds or investment pools such as Grayscale Bitcoin Trust, Bitwise 10 Crypto Index Fund. Some of them can accept investments from several thousand dollars, but this can be a way to invest in cryptocurrencies that does not require you to personally participate in trading.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: In terms of investment in cryptocurrency, there's no specific amount you need, you don't need to have 1 BTC, 1 ETC or other coins that must need to have at least a high value immediately, just you can afford to make an invest go for it you can learn a lot with that 10 dollars investment, in my experience, i start in crypto with the 20$ only in my pocket and trying to risk that time I make an investment with the XRP and that's the lowest point of the bitcoin with the price of 3k USD and i grab the opportunity to buy every time i have an income i bought different coins the time when the bull run comes i sell and make a profit with the different projects, now ill do the same thing to earn again just don't hesitate.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Steps to start;• Set up a wallet (for free),• Create a back up,• Find an exchange that allows a minimum investment lower than $10,• Trade there and secure your sats in your wallet,• Repeat the process when you get another $10.

comments.author: Daniel91
comments.body: In fact, do you know that you can start your crypto journey without any money, with 0$ ?Look under economy/marketplace/services and if you have some knowledge or skills in programming, if you know how to make a logo or can help with translation into other languages, then you can already start earning your first bitcoin without any investment of money, just based on your work.As for trading, $10 is too small to start with, and besides, crypto trading is really not for everyone because you need to know how to analyze the crypto market, predict trends...Many have tried to trade in the crypto market, but not all of them succeeded, so I advise you not to rush until you learn all the necessary trading skills, and until you determine your specific investment goals and have a clear exit strategy.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: gurujangid on April 02, 2023, 08:41:37 AMHow can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?Starting with $10 in the cryptocurrency market is definitely possible, but I would still recommend starting with a little more to give yourself more flexibility and options. It's always good to have a little more capital to work with. In my opinion, you would be better off concentrating on increasing your capital. $10 may not get you very far, but if you can save up a little more, you can potentially invest in a wider range of cryptocurrencies. Just remember to do your research, invest wisely, and be prepared for the risks involved.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on April 02, 2023, 10:33:52 AM~snip~• Trade there and secure your sats in your wallet,• Repeat the process when you get another $10.Such a mission with only $10 is not only difficult to do, but in most cases it will be completely unprofitable due to the service/withdrawal fee that most CEX charge. If the OP decides to buy Bitcoin or some alternative, then it would be better for him not to make a separate withdrawal, but to do so after accumulating a slightly larger amount of coins. Of course, there is always a risk of keeping cryptocurrencies in a custodial wallet, but on the other hand, it is simply completely unprofitable to withdraw such small amounts.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on April 02, 2023, 01:49:47 PM<snip>The whole premise of my advice was that if the OP plans to invest $10 as a one time capital, they should barely expect any profit on it no matter how high Bitcoin goes, but to show that they can get Bitcoin exposure with as little an amount as possible. You're not limited to buying whole bitcoins but can purchase tiny fractions.I was actually referring to a P2P, decentralized exchange when I talked on securing in your wallet, in which case the bitcoins would have been directly transferred there by the seller, but thinking about it now, the transaction would still be too expensive for such a small amount of USD.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: For $10 as your capital and starting in the crypto market, it's shallow for trading with fees. You are already going to get eaten by it. You are better off gambling it for a high-risk high, reward thing, but I don't want you to do that if that's just what you have. Definitely not advising you to gamble, I'm just stating what you can do with $10.  Unless that $10 is in a frequency like weekly or something, that's a great way to invest in a coin continuously.

comments.author: rosenbauer02
comments.body: Just save more money before you start on crypto market. There is a reason why you should save more rather than starting with $10 capital which is a fee you need to pay for each transaction. If you have more funds for your capital then you don't have to worry about the fee and maximize your profit as much as possible depends on your funds. Well, if you only want to buy with your $10 and later on then that's okay or as what crwth said.

comments.author: Salahmu
comments.body: There is no fixed amount to start with, even $5 and above, it just depends on you how much you wish to trade on, but to make more profit you will need big capital to trade Bitcoin

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: gurujangid on April 02, 2023, 08:41:37 AMHow can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?10$ is small to start but still can able to be multiplied if you are eager to learn more knowledge and skills then trade it. comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: gurujangid on April 02, 2023, 08:41:37 AMHow can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?Investing with a small fraction of Bitcoin but not in trading.If that $10 is the amount that you can afford, there's no problem, you can continue purchasing with a DCA way, just like $10 for now, and the other week when there's a price correction you will invest again in $10 until it will become a large amount. That's why a fraction is purchasing Bitcoin, but be careful in purchasing and always read the terms on the exchange platform that you will use. Because there's a minimum required before you can withdraw your Bitcoin.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Check the exchanges on how much minimum deposit they allow but even with that, deposit only to the exchanges that's known and has a got a good reviews from the community.These are the exchanges on this top list of coinmarketcap: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/And as you try to trade with $10, that's a good start to learn a lot of lessons from your trade because that might just be one trade away and you'll not be able to trade back after exchanging that with another altcoin.Because in one exchange that I know, Binance, the minimum trade there is $10 and with some fees you pay, that $10 will be lessen eventually and you won't be able to trade with your 2nd trade because the value of your purchased coin might not be $10 anymore.

comments.author: jeraldskie11
comments.body: Quote from: gurujangid on April 02, 2023, 08:41:37 AMHow can we start with $10 in CRYPTO MARKET?$10 is quite small for investment as there is a higher fee. You can only make your money to $20 if the price gets double and might be difficult to happen in just a week. So if you're looking for alternative ways to preserve or make it double in a short period of time, I recommend this two ways of earning in crypto space:PERPETUAL TRADING - it's a way of trading that you can be able to use leverage to earn much money with a small movement in a markets price, so $20 in a days is possible. This is not recommendable for beginners especially to those who don't have enough knowledge in trading. Learning what is cross mode and isolated mode is a must.P2P TRADING - is a way of buying and selling cryptocurrency directly to a user without intermediaries so we expect the fee is very low. Though it's hard to trust if the other party would send the payment, crypto exchanges uses escrow to avoid this scenario. You earning is might be small, but as long as you know how it works your capital will be safe.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: The first thing is not the amount but to learn about this volatile market and then choose what coins have potential growth chance that could give you profit in short or long run.You can invest $10 also but suppose you choose ETH like coin it would charge you high fees that you won't be able to trade so some low market cap coins but they will not give you return.So first learn about market instead of asking direct advice where to start will help you more.
